BlackNightmare/Darkfate/NightStrike:


"It's show time"said BlackNightmare with a devil smile and she flew 
toward the exit followed by DarkFate and NightSTrike

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> The last minion opened a channel to her five brethren
> "Hurry up, Unicron will not wait!  Go and attack those Maximals 
before I have to get down there and motivate you!"
> Necross, already in a foul humor, snapped back.
> "Well why don't you get down here and do it for us, then!"
> "Because Unicron wants you to, not me.  That is why I am staying 
here."
> Necross grudgingly went silent as Splattercannon opened the outer 
door, exposing the five minions to the vacuum of outerspace.  
> "Let's go, I want to destroy something!"
> Necross shook his head, Splattercannon was an enthusiastic idiot.
> "Let's go then!  We are wasting my time!" 
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Darkfate/Blacknightmare/Nightstrike:
> 
> "Yesss"hissed Darkfate"We should destroy the Matrix of Leader ship 
before Unicron arrives, and its has to be hidden somewhere in 
MAximal base."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> "We are to attack and gauge the Maximal base's strength.  They are 
the number one concern, so Unicron has sent us to see what those 
Maximals are capable of," Necross said as the approached the 
airlock.  Splattercannon opened the inside door and motioned for the 
other four to go first.  Necross immediatly entered, and waited for 
the others.
> 
> "Their defenses are broken!  Let the slaughter BEGIN!" -Megatron, 
TF:TM
